name: The Plight of Invisible Man
description:
My second ever game jam from many years back. Play as a man who's superpower is turning invisible... only when he's not being looked at. Try to navigate your player around obstacles and guards while not being able to see yourself. If a guard looks at you though, you become visible and will be caught. Pretty difficult to play to be honest. Features one player and two player modes.

Controls: Arrow keys for movement.
